subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text:
Unknown. Compare {{cog|sit-pro|*s-raw||withered, residue, corpse}}, {{m|sit-pro|*rwat||stiff, tough}}, whence {{cog|my|ရော်||wither, become overripe; age}}, {{m|my|ရွတ်||old, stiff, tough}}. See also {{zh-l|古}}, {{zh-l|故}}.

An old Sino-Vietnamese borrowing is {{m|vi|rệu||overripe, pulpy}}.
